segments.text: How many languages can you speak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Besides Chinese , I can speak English and French .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You mean you can read and write both of them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I can only carry on a simple conversation in French .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you read and write English well ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can speak the language better than I read and write .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you speak the language well enough to communicate with people of English-speaking countries ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . I used to be an interpreter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think your English is good enough to do desk work ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The amount of English I know enables me to do general desk work . I believe what I know is sufficient to work in an American firm .
segments.speaker: S2
